Name: schedule_story_us_s
Description: 1 if user story is scheduled in sprint; 0 otherwise

Name: assign_task_tsk_w
Description: 1 if task is assigned to worker; 0 otherwise

Name: include_feature_rep_f
Description: 1 if feature is included in a release plan; 0 otherwise

Name: mitigate_blocker_bl
Description: 1 if blocker is mitigated/removed for planning; 0 otherwise

Name: allocate_effort_w_s
Description: Fraction of worker availability allocated to sprint s

Name: budget_spent_p
Description: Normalized fraction of budget consumed by project

Name: story_points_committed_s
Description: Total story points committed in sprint

Name: deploy_snapshot_s
Description: 1 if a development snapshot is produced for sprint; 0 otherwise

Name: choose_goal_sg_s
Description: 1 if sprint s pursues sprint goal sg; 0 otherwise

Name: select_team_for_project_t_p
Description: 1 if team t is assigned to project p; 0 otherwise

Name: setup_daily_scrum_duration_ds
Description: Chosen duration (minutes) for a daily scrum

Name: select_feature_f
Description: 1 if feature is selected for current planning scope
